skills.name: Relish [Enforced Ability]
skills.description: Whenever another uses [Strike] targeting you, they must discard a basic card, or that [Strike] has no effect on you.

skills.name: Devolution
skills.description: You can skip your play phase. If you do so, you can discard a hand card at the end of your turn and let another player start an extra turn.

skills.name: Irony [Monarch Ability][Awakening Ability]
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, if your health the lowest or among the lowest, you must raise your health limit by 1, regain 1 unit of health and permanently gain the ability [Rouse].

skills.name: Benevolence
skills.description: During your playing phase, you can give any amount of hand cards to another player.  If the total number of cards given away is 2 or more, you regain 1 health.

skills.name: Rouse [Monarch Ability]
skills.description: You can ask any Shu characters to use a [Strike] for you.
